标题: Dinnerbone: 欢迎下载Linux系统启动器 本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2017-1-23 16:18 编辑 

https://twitter.com/Dinnerbone/status/821724664598765570

原文: Another build of the new Minecraft Launcher. Now with linux support! Get it whilst it's not that hot.
译文: 这是Minecraft启动器的另一个版本，它现在支持Linux系统了!在它成为热门之前赶紧下载吧!
Take care. Big brother's watchin' u.
